name: Lobo
overview: GOT YER FRAGGIN' GAME RIGHT HERE! Galaxies breathe a sign of relief as Lobo passes through. The merciless interstellar bounty hunter roars his way through the cold darkness of space, seeking out the universe's most dangerous and highest paying bounties, including Dox, Kringle, Loo, Nitro, Shaola and the menacing Lobo clone. Lobo is on the hunt! No enemy is too mean, no battle too brutal, interstellar scum have nowhere to hide!
